resources.string: You can enable and disable kiosk mode in Homer Audio Player lock down settings.
To enable kiosk mode you need to install Homer Kiosk Setup as a device owner application.

This action cannot be easily undone.
Return the device to regular use, it will no longer be possible to use kiosk mode in Homer Player.

Use Factory Reset instead of (or in addition to) using this function.
Allows to automatically re-enable lockdown mode after it has been temporarily disabled.
